content.detailedDescription: A man driving into suburban jacksonville, nc, noticed a horizontal line oftriangular colored lights pacing his and other cars on the highway. eachtriangle repeatedly inverted (i.E., point up, then down), changing colors (red,blue, green and yellow) as it did so. using a mobile phone, the witnesscontacted camp lejeune (located in the jacksonville area) during the sighting.Air traffic control tower personnel stated that nothing unusual was on radar.The man then stopped and discerned the object as dark, about 100 feet in length,and nearly cylindrical, its top and bottom angling slightly to a centered point.The object continued into the distance, then rose vertically and was lost in thenight sky. no sound was detected at any time.
content.summary: Cylindrical object pacing car near nc marine base.

content.detailedDescription: A man in his driveway observed a fuzzy bright red light moving in the distance.The light descended and resolved into a 60-75-foot grid of lights -- four redlights on each side with a square of four blue lights within. a white light wasflashing below the grid. the grid descended below a treeline one or two milesaway. the man soon noticed a steady orange light, accompanied by a flashing whitelight, approaching from the same direction. the flight and speed were somewhaterratic. this anomaly was lost from view on the horizon after about 5 minutes.After a failed attempt to find camera film, the man returned outside to see thesame or another orange light moving erratically in the distance, including avertical "s" maneuver. soon a white beam, resembling an auto headlight pointing down, along with asmaller flashing white light were seen within 100 yards. these began to riseabove the field. then the grid of red and blue was again observed, this timeabove the white lights. the grid flashed once in a strobe-like fashion. all ofthe lights then proceeded laterally and slowly from the scene until lost in thedistance. no sound was heard at any time and no object shape could be discerned.Total duration was one hour.
content.summary: Series of lights moving erratically in rural ny.

content.detailedDescription: Unable to sleep, a woman was sitting in her livingroom when she heard a roaringsound. she observed a 30-foot disc rise from a nearby cornfield and fly quicklyover her roof. the object exterior was dark, with a ring of steady red lights.No other features were noted. she ran to another room and saw the object moveinto the distance, then "fade out" seemingly before being lost on the horizon.Total sighting duration was a matter of seconds.
content.summary: Disc rises from field and flies over home in mn.

content.detailedDescription: Witness observed from inside his home for 1 1/2 - 2 minutes a hovering objectwhose underside resembled a teardrop, dull aluminum in appearance, 30-40 feetlong and 12-18 feet wide, near a mountain crest 300 yards away. the object had aprotuberance resembling a domed cockpit in the forward center of the top,revealed when it tilted at one point. he used binoculars momentarily. a "blackhole" appeared at the bottom center. several thin white rays of light castoutward 50-100 feet. no other exterior features were noted. the hole vanished ashe watched, then the object "disappeared".
content.summary: Teardrop-shaped object casting light rays over ga

content.detailedDescription: At dusk a man noticed a black spot in the sky that approached his apartment, atone point doubling in size. as it approached to nearly overhead at 500-700 feet,the object repeatedly tilted from side to side, revealing its bottom as black,round and segmented as with pie slices. its diameter was estimated asapproximately 100 feet. the sides were bluish silver, shrouded in black mist.Beams of brilliant white light extended about 10 feet from each of six whitelights on the underside. these "tubes" did not spread out and, despite theirbrilliance, produced no halo effect and were not hard to look at. no sound washeard throughout the approximate 25-second sighting. the man ran into hisapartment to retrieve a camcorder and urge his wife to join him. when hereturned outside, the object could not be relocated. immediately, the man felt an ominous sense of foreboding and drove with his wifeto another area to stay in a motel for the night. the next morning he discovereda sunburn-like redness on his shoulders, chest and abdomen -- areas facing theobject as it approached (though he had been wearing a tee-shirt and pants). theredness faded within the next two days.In the months following the event the man had trouble sleeping, two odd dreams,and out-of-body experiences.
content.summary: Shrouded silvery blue disc & witness "sunburn" in

content.detailedDescription: My wife, jean, was relaxing in our backyard while i was inside, preparing ourdinner. she was looking at the sky and suddenly called me to come out quickly.The sky was clear with a slight haze3b there was almost no wind. many stars were visible. she called me out towitness what she saw, which she thought might have been a satellite travellingfrom north to south, almost directly overhead. i missed seeing the object.Shethen called my attention to another star-like object that we both saw travellingfrom north to south, about 75 degrees from the horizon. another similarstar-like object approached from the south, on a near-collision course with theobject. this 3rd object travelled faster than the 2nd object. the 3rd objectsspeed was much faster than a commercial plane. although we have no method ofestimating any of the objects speed or altitude, i would guess that the objectswere several thousand feet up and travelling at 1,000 to 2,000 mph. i focused onthe 2nd object, which slowed to half-speed and then slowly disappeared, as if itbegan a rapid vertical ascent. what i thought was quite curious was the motionof both of these objects3b they travelled in a straight line but with a cyclical kind of wobble, orwhirl. that is to say they moved in a regular small spiral with a duration ofabout 1 second for each loop.The total length of time for these sightings wasabout 10 minutes. after the 3rd object disappeared from view, she began askingme questions about what we saw. could they have been man-made satellites? iresponded that satellites dont travel in small spirals. could they have beenmeteors or comets? meteors travel much faster and comets travel much slower thanwhat we saw. could they have been man-made aircraft? they travelled quite unlikeanything that i have previously seen. could they have been reflections againstthe vapor in the night sky? possibly, but two of the objects moved in almostopposite directions toward each other. i dont think weather ballons can move asfast as what we saw.After these sightings and our conversation, we continued tolook into the sky for another 15 minutes, but we saw nothing else that wasunusual.
content.summary: 9/22/00 seattle: sighting of 3 separate high altitude objects

content.detailedDescription: During a power outage in the city, a woman went to the landing of her apartmentto see if other residences were affected. she observed a block-sized, dark ovalobject hovering over a building across the street. no sound was heard. manybright white lights rimmed the object. she attempted to hail neighbors but wasunsuccessful. when she looked back, the object was gone.
content.summary: Oval object hovering over roof in minneapolis.

content.detailedDescription: A prison employee off duty and deer hunting observed lights approaching slowlyuntil nearly overhead. he discerned an oval-shaped object with a silvery blueperimeter and dark underside. four white lights were spaced around theperimeter. fin-like protrusions on the bottom appeared to rotate. the object waseither silent or emitted a faint low hum. it continued on slowly, changeddirection and was soon lost from view.
content.summary: Domed oval approached deer hunter; possible ce-4.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately five teens (four nonreporting) were playing outside. they observedthree bright white lights rise from a distant farm field and slowly approach.The mother of the reporting teen joined the boys outside. a many-side polyhedronobject in the overall shape of an oval moved above nearby trees, then proceededslowly into the distance. the witnesses attempted to follow in a car but soonlost track of it. the objects dimensions were reported as about 65-70 feet by 50 feet.Rectangular panels of amber and red light covered the entire underside andextended partway up the sides. three bright white lights shone on one end.
content.summary: Oval disc with lighted panels near teens and mothe

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on hwy 66 about 3 miles from catoosa city limits when inoticed some strobe-lights come over the highway i had no clue as to what it wasi asked my wife if she saw that her reply was yes. i was very awh struck becauseof the peculiarity of the object.My wife and i have not talked about it since.The object appeared as 3 sets of triangle lights (very bright whitelights)strobing in a pattern the object appeared to jump from one position toanother extremly fast at one point the object moved behind a hill,then back intoview. i and my wife continued to watch the object until we drove out ofview.Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
content.summary: Three triangle shaped lights strobing in a patter

content.detailedDescription: A woman attending the restroom late at night observed a hovering disc over treesin the near distance. the object had a ring of white lights at the top andbottom and red lights around the middle. the object approached slowly. the womanraced to lock doors, but a force pushed open the kitchen door. a mist or fog anda long skinny hand at childs height came through the opening. a telepathicmessage scolded her for resisting. after a time lapse, she awoke in her bed.
content.summary: Entity forcibly entered home; possible abduction.

content.detailedDescription: A woman awoke when her shoulder was touched. something grabbed her feet, flippedher over onto her stomach, then dragged her toward the foot of the bed. herhusband failed to stir despite the disturbance of her landing on him whenflipped. she lost consciousness when partly out of bed. she awoke anundetermined time later in the kitchen, observing a beam of light through thewindow from above the house. the sliding window was off its track and angledoutward. she felt a hand and sensed an unspoken message of reassurance and toreturn to bed. she awoke a short time later, frightened and with a soreshoulder.
content.summary: Woman dragged from bed; possible abduction.

content.detailedDescription: A woman was awakened by a being (known to her as "marcus") enveloped in light,who held out his hands and drew her toward him. she experienced the sense of"dancing" or a spiritual reunion for unknown minutes. following a time lapse sheawoke in bed.She described the being as close to 7 feet tall, handsome yet with cat-likefacial features, long brown hair, loose-fitting pants and a short-sleeve shirt.A metal breastplate covered his chest with a centered insignia. in the aftermath, the woman became interested in spiritual subjects.
content.summary: Very tall entity in womans bedroom.

content.detailedDescription: Two young men on a rural road heard a rumble and saw a black isosceles trianglewith a slightly convex rear side moving overhead. the object was estimated to beabout 10,000 feet in the air and 3-4 football fields in front-to-rear length.Red and white lights were strobing at the rear. a detached blue rod or beam witha white lightat either end was seen at a lower altitude. they observed the triangular objectuntil it was lost from view on the horizon. duration estimated at 3-4 minutes.
content.summary: Black triangle with rumbling sound over nc.

content.detailedDescription: July 4, 2000 sighting of bright, red glowing (steady)light over des moinesmetro-area, which transited west des moines, urbandale, clive, windsor heights,and des moines proper, sometimes hovering for several minutes, then movingslowly - during 45 - 60 minute period no sound. 2 red-light (steady) controlleddescents (from the main object) occurred in widely separate locations, withseveral witnesses seeing descent object then make a 90-degree turn.  mainobjects transit was somewhat horseshoe shaped around the city and it would havetraveled against the wind, no matter what the wind direction.  cloud ceiling at8,000 feet.  various calculations seem to indicate the size probably in 70-100foot category, with the altitude somewhere between 3,000 - 6500 feet.  shapevariously described as: rounded rectangular/tubular-vertical; oval; roundedtriangle; 3 light cluster;round red light.  one couple described the main objectas larger than an airliner on approach (about 2600 ft.) near their home with theobject farther away and above the airliner.  (perhaps red light made it seembigger,but since it was farther away, their description was taken seriously). two other witnesses (one a pilot, and one a manager - both male) observing themain object at 80-85 degrees up from horizon not far from the "couple" referredto above, indicated they thought object sizeable enough to rival size ofairliner.  light airplanes, helicopter, and airliner seen and recognized as suchby some of the witnesses during sighting along with also seeing the main object.
content.summary: Red light transit,2 control descent,45 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: 1. iwas on my back deck with my dog and a cup of coffee looking at the stars outto the west where i usually see a planet rise i saw what i thought was a medicalchopper coming in to our local hospital.It approched just like the clevelandevac chopper but at about a mile out it started flashing a white strobe on top.I thought it was unusual,then it flashed red on top and changed from west toeast to north at a 45 degree angle from its original flight path its speed wasso fast that i lost sight of it just where it should have reappered over myneighbors house.I did not see any real shape to the craft just its lights and ihave watched the stars in that area of the sky many times and it was no star andit was not a helicopter  and it was not a civilian air craft.If it was a jetthen somebody should scrape the pilot out of his seat
content.summary: Bright lights that changed direction at unbeleivab

content.detailedDescription: There are many things i am certain would be concidered worthwhile knowing, forat the very least me,24 the only other person i keep in contact with, whos version of recall are veryvery close to mine , with only a single discrepency in appearance. we lost 3hours and 4 miles that night. hypnosis by a true christian therapist/dr ? wouldhave to be found by me to be open to the process of regression myself and theother specified in the communication are in agreement.
content.summary: Time loss and mutual sighting of 12 or more people
Observed a dark triangular object following an air

content.detailedDescription: While walking her dog near the gulfport airport, a woman noticed an isoscelestriangular object high in the sky beyond a nearby line of pine trees. theunderside of the object was covered in bluish-white lights. she began to runtoward the trees, intending to get a better look on the far side, but the lightson the object immediately extinguished. she was then unable to see the object inthe night sky. distance from the witness and altitude were undetermined.Duration of the event was about 45 seconds.
content.summary: Triangle near gulfport, ms airport.

content.detailedDescription: Four adults were camping in a canyone along the colorado river in utah. thewitness and a second (nonreporting) woman were outside observing the night sky.The males were either in their tent or not present. a bright white light with abluish border appeared over a nearby mountain. it shone a white beam edged inblue angularly toward the ground. momentarily the leading edge of the beamretracted into the light source. duratio of the event was about 10 seconds.
content.summary: Retracting beam of light along colorado river in u

content.detailedDescription: A mother and her two girls observed a black disc with a translucent dome thatpaced their car. their view was obstructed momentarily, then they spotted itagain circling obove a tall building. the object had numerous red and yellowlights around the rim, some of which were flashing sequentially, as well as bluelights with a textured surface. the object rose through a cloud and out ofsight.
content.summary: Black disc with transparent dome near building in

content.detailedDescription: While driving, two men noticed two black triangular objects (each side 40-50feet) hovering 300-350 feet away. a white light was at each point and ared-orange light was centered underneath. at each rear point was a protrusionextending a few feet beyond the rear side. no sound was heard. the witnessesexited their car to observe. the objects soon rotated, then glided slowly away.Duration of the sighting was estimated as 25 minutes.
content.summary: Two black triangles hovering at ce distance in mn.

content.detailedDescription: A man observed a "half moon" object (i.E., disc shaped like an upright bowl)with a notched effect on one side, rising at 45 degrees from a valley in thedistance. the white exterior was as bright as a full moon. the object continuedto ascend slowly over twenty minutes until lost from view.
content.summary: "half moon" disc rose over georgia valley.

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage).
content.summary: Sighting

content.detailedDescription: It was april 2,1994. daylight savings time. a buddy and i from work decided togo for a fishing trip on the boat he just bought. we picked lake sonoma , andyou had to get to the campsites by boat. we set up camp friday night just bydark, then decided to cast a few times off the shore and
content.summary: A craft followed our boat closley for almost an ho

content.detailedDescription: A woman driving, stopped at a crossing of roads, observed a silvery disc half amile away and well under 1,000 feet altitude. it was estimated as 40 feet indiameter with a distinctive dome. she watched for 20-25 seconds before theobject "blinked out", seemingly without accelerating away.
content.summary: Domed disc hovered near prior lake, mn.

content.detailedDescription: Woman driving, at a stoplight observed a dull silver disc a block away, movingslowly near the treetops. she viewed it intermittently as she drove, then lostit beyond nearby trees. no indication that others noticed the object.
content.summary: Dull silver disc near treetops in hastings, mn.

content.detailedDescription: A woman awoke to see a light on her bedroom ceiling and three entities standingby the bed, each 3 1/2 feet tall and floating above the floor. she kicked one inthe chest. it felt light and flew backward, landing on its hindside. she thenlost consciousness and remembers nothing more.
content.summary: Woman kicked an entity in her bedroom.

content.detailedDescription: While driving, a woman spotted a smallish domed disc hovering over a nearbylake. the sun reflected off one side. as she approached, the object slowlydescended until lost below a treeline. duration, 1-2 minutes.
content.summary: Small domed disc hovering over lake elmo, mn.
A luminous sphere dividing from one object into fo
